00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036

00046 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 void CMP_Configuration(void);
00048 
00049 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00051   * @brief  Main program.
00052   * @retval None
00053   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00054 int main(void)
00055 {
00056   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00057 
00058   CMP_Configuration();
00059 
00060   /* Enable CMP                                                                                             */
00061   CMP_UnprotectConfig(HTCFG_CP_PORT);
00062   CMP_Cmd(HTCFG_CP_PORT, ENABLE);
00063 
00064   /* Infinite loop                                                                                          */
00065   while (1)
00066   {
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  Comparator configuration.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 void CMP_Configuration(void)
00075 {
00076   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00077     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00078     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO  = 1;
00079     CKCUClock.Bit.CMP   = 1;
00080     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00081   }
00082 
00083   /* Configure AFIO mode as CMP function                                                                    */
00084   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_CP_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_CP_AFIO_PIN , AFIO_FUN_CMP);
00085 
00086   {
00087     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088     /* Set CMP0 Control Reg:                                                                                */
00089     /*  1. Setting comparator internal 6-bit/8-bit scaler reference voltage output.                         */
00090     /*  2. Setting scaler reference voltage source comes from VDDA.                                         */
00091     /*  3. Enable scaler for comparator voltage reference.                                                  */
00092     /*  4. Enable scaler output to CN pin.                                                                  */
00093     /*  5. Setting CVREF = 31 * (VDDA - VSSA) / ((2 ^ n) - 1), n represent the bits of the scaler           */
00094     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00095 
00096     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00097        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00098        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00099     */
00100     CMP_InitTypeDef CMP_IniStruct;
00101 
00102     #if 0
00103     CMP_StructInit(&CMP_IniStruct);
00104     #endif
00105     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_Wakeup            = CMP_WUP_DISABLE;
00106     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_OutputSelection   = CMP_TRIG_NONE;
00107     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_ScalerSource      = CMP_SCALER_SRC_VDDA;
00108     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_ScalerOutputBuf   = CMP_SCALER_OBUF_ENABLE;
00109     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_ScalerEnable      = CMP_SCALER_ENABLE;
00110     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_CoutSync          = CMP_ASYNC_OUTPUT;
00111     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_OutputPol         = CMP_NONINV_OUTPUT;
00112     #if defined(USE_HT32F65230_40) || defined(USE_HT32F65232)
00113     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_InputSelection    = CMP_INPUT_CMPnP;
00114     #endif
00115     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_InvInputSelection = CMP_SCALER_CN_IN;
00116     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_Hysteresis        = CMP_NO_HYSTERESIS;
00117     CMP_IniStruct.CMP_Speed             = CMP_LOW_SPEED;
00118     CMP_UnprotectConfig(HTCFG_CP_PORT);
00119     CMP_Init(HTCFG_CP_PORT, &CMP_IniStruct);
00120   }
00121 
00122   /* CVREF = 31 * (VDDA - VSSA) / ((2 ^ n) - 1), n represent the bits of the scaler                         */
00123   CMP_SetScalerValue(HTCFG_CP_PORT, 31);
00124 
00125   /* Enable CMP rising/falling edge detection.                                                              */
00126   CMP_EdgeDetectConfig(HTCFG_CP_PORT, CMP_RE_Detect | CMP_FE_Detect, ENABLE);
00127 
00128   /* Enable CMP Interrupt                                                                                   */
00129   CMP_IntConfig(HTCFG_CP_PORT, CMP_INT_RE | CMP_INT_FE, ENABLE);
00130   NVIC_EnableIRQ(HTCFG_CMP_IRQn);
00131 }
00132 
00133 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00134 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00135   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00136   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00137   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00138   * @retval None
00139   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00140 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00141 {
00142   /*
00143      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00144      Debug message can be added here.
00145      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00146   */
00147 
00148   while (1)
00149   {
00150   }
00151 }
00152 #endif
